@ParametersAreNonnullByDefault

Package com.projetloki.genesis.image

Library for rapidly generating CSS background images.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Gradient.DensityMap
    A density map associates each point of a rectangle to a value between 0 and 1.
    Hashable
    An object with a hash code of arbitrary bit length.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Border
    A border around the edge of a shape.
    Color
    An immutable color in the red/green/blue color space.
    Font
    A font with unspecified size.
    FontCatalog
    A catalog of free and open source fonts, by The League of Moveable Type.
    Gradient
    A density map factory.
    Gradients
    Static utility methods pertaining to Gradient instances.
    Image
    An image maps every point of a rectangle to a color and an opacity.
    Images
    Static utility methods pertaining to Image instances.
    MathFunction
    A function from [0, 1] to [0, 1].
    MathFunctions
    Static utility methods pertaining to MathFunction instances.
    MathVector
    An immutable geometric vector, represented by its x- and y- coordinates in the plane.
    Point
    An immutable point, located by its x- and y- coordinates in the plane.
    Shape
    A shape in the plane, defined by its interior.
    Shaper
    A Shape factory to construct shapes fitting the size of an image.
    Shapers
    Static utility methods pertaining to Shaper instances.
    Shapes
    Static utility methods pertaining to Shape instances.
    TextShape
    A shape whose interior corresponds to the rendering of a text.
    TextShape.Glyph
    A single glyph in a text shape.

Package com.projetloki.genesis.image Description

Library for rapidly generating CSS background images. For those of us who don't have time to learn Photoshop. See Image for an example.
